headline: Why Best Buy (BBY) Is Up 5.4% After Uber Eats Delivery Deal and Strong Earnings
summary: Best Buy recently reported quarterly revenues and earnings ahead of expectations, while expanding its omnichannel reach through a major partnership with Uber Eats for on-demand electronics and appliance delivery from over 800 stores. This collaboration reflects Best Buy's ongoing efforts to strengthen its digital presence and enhance customer convenience in a competitive retail landscape. We'll examine how the Uber Eats partnership enhances Best Buy's omnichannel model and may influence its...
